analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xedae73d8ae8b81a19439acc0591ca8b1e0072312.sol#369-381) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/23/0xedae73d8ae8b81a19439acc0591ca8b1e0072312.sol#379)

TokenDestructible.destroy (/unique_chucks/23/0xedae73d8ae8b81a19439acc0591ca8b1e0072312.sol#458-468) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/23/0xedae73d8ae8b81a19439acc0591ca8b1e0072312.sol#465-467)

ERC223.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/23/0xedae73d8ae8b81a19439acc0591ca8b1e0072312.sol#543-571)
	- /unique_chucks/23/0xedae73d8ae8b81a19439acc0591ca8b1e0072312.sol#555-562
